content.p: Are you looking to advertise your roles, internships, work experience opportunities and placements in the Midlands? The Stay Local Careers Fair is a great opportunity to connect with talented Nottingham students to join your organisation. Monday 10 March, 2025 11.30am - 2.30pm The Great Hall, University Park Please contact the recruiter services team to book your place at the fair. Price: Â£200 + VAT If you have any questions please contact the Recruiter Services team. Recruiter Services telephone: +44 (0) 115 82 32233 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: recruiterservices@nottingham.ac.uk
